Name: SymbolicName
Description: Service name for the SRV record. eg: xmpp, ldap, etc.

Name: Port
Description: The TCP or UDP port on which the service is found.

Name: Target
Description: Specifies the Target Hostname or IP Address.

Name: Priority
Description: Specifies the Priority value of the SRV record.

Name: Weight
Description: Specifies the weight of the SRV record.
